name: Revised_UFO_Game_Modifications_Purav_Patel
description:
Purav Patel (IT-201 Thursday class)

Assignment 5 - UFO Game Modifications

The objectives of the game is to collect valuable gems in the space to go to next level.  The controls of the game are up and down keys to move up and down respectively and right and left arrows to move in right and left directions. Space is to shoot.
